page.title: 03MACHINES IN THE HOME (1985)
page.content: In our kitchen we have a kettle to boil water,an electric cooker, with four hot plates a grill and an oven, a mixer to make puddings and pastries, a refridgerator and a freezer to preserve food. In the dining room we have a boiler that heats the water for all the radiators in the house. These keep us warm. In our lounge we have a television, a video cassette recorder and a stereo tape recorder. In my bedroom I have a calculator keyboard on which I play different tunes and work out sums. I also have a Pac-man game, where the little bug goes round eating red dots. In my parents bedroom there is a television, and a radio alarm clock to get them up in the morning. by C. Higgins
